scopecontent.p: The collection consists of several card files created or collected by Helen Worst. One card file relates to the Edmunds family of Cape May, New Jersey, and Philadelphia. The cards list names and ancestries and often include related articles on the people. There is a card file pertaining to information from Memorials of the Huguenots in America by Rev. A. Stapleton. There are also miscellaneous cards listing notes on a variety of people, as well as cards grouped by people's ethnicity (French, Jewish) or arrival in America (Mayflower). Many of these draw from published resources and collections available at The Historical Society of Pennsylvania and some have clippings attached. The collection also include several letters to Helen Worst from the Welcome Society, for which Worst worked as a genealogist.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
